attributes.title: Set Phasers to Dumb - The Forgotten Planet RPG Ep 1
attributes.description:
Go to http://factormeals.com/mustbedice50 and use code mustbedice50 to get 50% off your first box.



In which our intrepid explorers of the infinite cosmos find themselves marooned on an unknown planet, trek into strange murky wilderness, engage in an impromptu tickle party, and strangle more tiny adorable creatures than I care remember.



Follow us on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/_JacobFullerton

https://twitter.com/linzbot_

https://twitter.com/jonsmiff

https://twitter.com/adambrouillard



Tshirts n stuff: https://store.roosterteeth.com/collections/funhaus

Welcome to Funhaus, the internet's ONLY comedy, gaming, and variety channel since 2015!

About Must Be Dice: The Forgotten Planet - An all new RPG adventure from Funhaus featuring space exploration, aliens, scruffy-looking bounty hunters, scum, villainy, glowy swords, and all kinds of other totally original ideas.   

Join FIRST to watch episodes early: http://bit.ly/2uNNz0O

attributes.title: A Newt Hope: The Forgotten Planet RPG Ep 2
attributes.description:
Go to http://hellofresh.com/mustbedice50 and use code mustbedice50 for 50% off, plus your first box ships free!

Go to http://expressvpn.com/mustbedice to get an extra 3 months free. 



In which our intrepid explorers of the infinite cosmos discover a strange new alien culture, open mouth kiss a translating machine, face the planet's greatest menace, and yeah, melt a few people in the process.

attributes.title: A Hero's Guide to Torture and Dismemberment: The Forgotten Planet RPG Ep 3 | Must Be Dice
attributes.description:
In which our intrepid explorers of the infinite cosmos enjoy a victory feast, interrogate their vanquished enemies, fly victorious into mysterious new regions of the planet, and feed some sort of erotic space yolk to a severed head!

attributes.title: Two in the VGA, One in the SCSI - The Forgotten Planet RPG Ep 4 | Must Be Dice
attributes.description:
Go to http://factormeals.com/mustbedice40 and use code mustbedice40 to get 40% 

Go to http://babbel.com and use code MUSTBEDICE to get 6 months of Babbel for the price of 3.



In which our intrepid explorers of the infinite cosmos meet an all too eager pleasure-bot, dine on expired canned goods, introduce a salamander to the ways of love, and reveal a terrifying secret!

attributes.title: How Mutant Hybrid Nightmare Babies are Made - The Forgotten Planet RPG Ep 5 | Must Be Dice
attributes.description:
In which our intrepid explorers of the infinite cosmos help one of their own through the miracle of explosive, stomach-churning childbirth, fend off an army of adorable space marauders, and actually roll some dice for once.

attributes.title: Rise of the Ape of the Planet of the Salamanders - The Forgotten Planet RPG Finale | Must Be Dice
attributes.description:
Go to http://rtxaustin.com to buy your badge!



In which our intrepid explorers of the infinite cosmos awaken to find themselves trapped in an arena that is nothing at all like the one on Geonosis with all those little wasp creatures so don't even think it. Will they defeat the great beast that awaits them? Will peace finally come to Poon's people? The answers to these questions and more await you in the final episode of The Forgotten Planet!
